Cheltenham Festival Day 1 - David Nicholson Mares Hurdle Odds

The David Nicholson Mares Hurdle gives the horses here a chance to race against their own gender and in recent years we had a winner in Quevega of the very highest quality. It was added to the Cheltenham Festival in 2008 but has already become a popular race with fans and punters in that short time.

All eyes this season are on Annie Power who is hoping to give Willie Mullins and Ruby Walsh yet another win in the race.
